name: Super Saturdays
description: Our Super Saturday field trips invite mentors and youth to bond over experiential activities around the Bay Area. This program helps build youth confidence and allows them to explore their inner child through memorable experiences. Many of the Bayview youth are confined to an on-going cycle of drugs and gang violence in their neighborhoods. The goal is to show them there is more to life by exposing them to different adventures and opportunities that can help them build an open mindset about the
